name: MVVMBasic
summary: This is a generic version of a MVVM pattern. The Model-View-ViewModel pattern can be used on all XAML platforms.
author: Microsoft

name: Prism
summary: Prism is a framework for building loosely coupled, maintainable, and testable XAML applications.
author: Brian Lagunas, Bart Lannoeye, Dan Siegel
